instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01041: What is 820-01041? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.ISL9240: What is ISL9240? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2018 through 2020.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01041</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> charging problems
threads.message:
This arrived only powering on from the battery. No liquid.

With a/c adapter only it is stuck at 5v 0.225a With battery connected 20v 0amps. In O.S the battery is recognized but will not charge.

Tried another <CHIP>ISL9240</CHIP> but no change.

Cannot enter dfu mode with keyboard. When jumping KIWK003 pads still no dfu mode.

What should be checked next????
